Plot: A woman and her daughter emigrate from Mexico for a better life in America, where they start working for a family where the patriarch is a newly celebrated chef with an insecure wife.
Title: Spanglish
Actors: Adam Sandler, Téa Leoni, Paz Vega, Cloris Leachman
tomatoConsensus: Paz Vega shines, and Adam Sandler gives a performance of thoughtfulness and depth, but Spanglish is ultimately undermined by sitcommy plotting and unearned uplift.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 5 wins & 10 nominations.
